import React from "react"; import "./Hotel.css"; import foto1 from "./foto1.png"; import { Card, Button, Container, Col } from "react-bootstrap"; function Hotel(props) { return (
{props.name} - {props.rate}

{props.location}

{props.days}

{props.oceanview == true ? "oceanview" : ""} {props.roomtype}{" "} {props.mealtype}

{props.price}
{props.name} - {props.rate}

{props.location}

{props.days}

{props.oceanview == true ? "oceanview" : ""} {props.roomtype}{" "} {props.mealtype}

{props.price}
); } export default Hotel;
